column1: Elemmírë was one of the lights kindled by Varda far in the past
column2: to welcome the Elves to Arda on their awakening. It is described in Quenta Silmarillion as a star
column3: but in fact it was most likely identified with one of the planets.

column1: Elemmírë means "star-jewel". Its a compound from elen and mírë. The letters n+m from both words are assimilated to long mm
J.R.R. Tolkiens notes on the subject are open to interpretation
column2: but they appear to identify Elemmírë as the planet we know today as Mercury.
